To reduce the spread of all respiratory viruses, including COVID-19, anyone who feels sick should stay home and complete the [self-assessment tool](https://www.ontario.ca/self-assessment/) to learn more about what to do next. Find out if you are eligible for [COVID-19 treatment](https://www.toronto.ca/home/covid-19/covid-19-what-you-should-do/covid-19-treatment/), continue to follow [public health measures](https://www.toronto.ca/home/covid-19/covid-19-reduce-virus-spread/) with your vaccinations including a [COVID-19 booster](https://www.toronto.ca/home/covid-19/covid-19-vaccines/covid-19-vaccine-eligibility-doses/?accordion=booster-doses) for the best protection.
